name: ev-server
description: Backend for Electric Vehicle charging station
author: LucasBrazi06 <sergefabiano@free.fr>

scripts.start:dev:doctorprof: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic doctor -- node dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:flameprof: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic flame -- node dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:bubbleprof: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic bubbleprof -- node dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:doctorprof: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic doctor -- node dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:flameprof: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic flame -- node dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:bubbleprof: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic bubbleprof -- node dist/start.js
scripts.clean-install-win: rmdir node_modules /S /Q && del package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force && npm install
scripts.clean-install-lin: rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -f ./package-lock.json && npm cache clear --force && npm install
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*Test.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:parallel: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha-parallel-tests -r ts-node/register test/**/*Test.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:charger: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/OCPP*Test.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:ocpi: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/OCPI*.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:tenant: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/TenantTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:org: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*OrgTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:setting: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/SettingTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:cypher: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/CypherTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:user: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/UserTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:siteorg: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/SiteOrgTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:transaction: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/TransactionTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:auth: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/AuthenticationTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:ocpp16: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/OCPPJson16Test.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:authentication: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/AuthenticationTest.ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:transactionTest: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha test/**/TemplateUnitTest.js --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:company: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/CompanyTest.ts --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
scripts.test:createContext: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig-test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/ContextBuilderRunner.ts --exit --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=outputs/mochawesome-report,json=false
